gundam_item.title: HGUC 1/144 RX-78-2 Gundam (Revive)
gundam_item.description: High Grade Universal Century model kit of the iconic RX-78-2 Gundam from Mobile Suit Gundam. Features modern articulation and proportions. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 MS-06S Zaku II Char Aznable Custom Ver. 2.0
gundam_item.description: Master Grade model kit of Char Aznable's custom Zaku II from Mobile Suit Gundam. Features inner frame and detailed mechanics. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: RG 1/144 Wing Gundam Zero EW
gundam_item.description: Real Grade model kit of the Wing Gundam Zero Custom from Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz. Highly detailed with advanced articulation. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 Freedom Gundam Ver. 2.0
gundam_item.description: Master Grade kit of the Freedom Gundam from Gundam SEED. Updated Ver. 2.0 with enhanced detail and articulation. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: PG 1/60 RX-0 Unicorn Gundam
gundam_item.description: Perfect Grade model kit of the Unicorn Gundam from Gundam Unicorn. Features complex transformation and LED compatibility (sold separately). Scale 1/60.

gundam_item.title: HG 1/144 Gundam Barbatos Lupus Rex
gundam_item.description: High Grade model kit of the Gundam Barbatos Lupus Rex from Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans. Features its iconic large mace. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: RG 1/144 Sazabi
gundam_item.description: Real Grade model kit of Char Aznable's Sazabi from Char's Counterattack. Features incredible detail and numerous gimmicks. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 RX-93 Nu Gundam Ver. Ka
gundam_item.description: Master Grade Ver. Ka model kit of Amuro Ray's Nu Gundam from Char's Counterattack. Designed by Hajime Katoki with intricate details and psycho-frame gimmick. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: HGUC 1/144 Kshatriya
gundam_item.description: High Grade Universal Century model kit of the Kshatriya from Gundam Unicorn. A large HG kit featuring its four binders. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 Sinanju Stein (Narrative Ver.) Ver. Ka
gundam_item.description: Master Grade Ver. Ka kit of the Sinanju Stein from Gundam Narrative. Features distinctive engravings and weaponry. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: RG 1/144 RX-78GP01 Gundam "Zephyranthes"
gundam_item.description: Real Grade model kit of the GP01 Zephyranthes from Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory. Includes core fighter system. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: HG 1/144 Gundam Aerial
gundam_item.description: High Grade model kit of the Gundam Aerial from Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury. Features bit staves and shield gimmick. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 Dynames Gundam
gundam_item.description: Master Grade model kit of the Dynames Gundam from Mobile Suit Gundam 00. Features GN Sniper Rifle and full shield deployment. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: SD Gundam Cross Silhouette RX-78-2 Gundam
gundam_item.description: Super Deformed Gundam Cross Silhouette kit of the RX-78-2 Gundam. Can be built with SD or taller CS frame (sold separately).

gundam_item.title: PG 1/60 Strike Freedom Gundam
gundam_item.description: Perfect Grade model kit of the Strike Freedom Gundam from Gundam SEED Destiny. Features gold-plated inner frame parts and dragoon system. Scale 1/60.

gundam_item.title: RE/100 1/100 MSN-04 II Nightingale
gundam_item.description: Reborn-One Hundred model kit of the massive Nightingale mobile suit from Char's Counterattack - Beltorchika's Children. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: HGUC 1/144 RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (A.E.U.G.) Revive
gundam_item.description: High Grade Universal Century Revive version of the Gundam Mk-II used by the A.E.U.G. in Zeta Gundam. Improved articulation. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 Tallgeese EW
gundam_item.description: Master Grade model kit of the Tallgeese from Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz. Features iconic Dober Gun and verniers. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: RG 1/144 Tallgeese EW
gundam_item.description: Real Grade model kit of the Tallgeese from Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz. Compact size with extreme detail and articulation. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MGEX 1/100 Strike Freedom Gundam
gundam_item.description: Master Grade Extreme model kit of the Strike Freedom Gundam. Features the most intricate metal-etched frame representation in Gunpla history. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: HG 1/144 Penelope
gundam_item.description: High Grade model kit of the Penelope from Mobile Suit Gundam: Hathaway's Flash. Can separate into Flight Unit and Odysseus Gundam. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 Hyaku-Shiki Ver. 2.0
gundam_item.description: Master Grade model kit of Quattro Bajeena's Hyaku-Shiki from Zeta Gundam. Features brilliant gold coating and updated mechanics. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: RG 1/144 Crossbone Gundam X1
gundam_item.description: Real Grade model kit of the Crossbone Gundam X1 from Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam. Features core fighter gimmick and signature weapons. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: HG 1/144 Gundam Gusion Rebake Full City
gundam_item.description: High Grade model kit of the Gundam Gusion Rebake Full City from Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans Season 2. Includes large backpack unit. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 Providence Gundam
gundam_item.description: Master Grade model kit of the Providence Gundam from Gundam SEED. Features the massive DRAGOON system backpack. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: PG 1/60 00 Raiser
gundam_item.description: Perfect Grade model kit combining the 00 Gundam and the 0 Raiser support craft from Gundam 00. Features light-up GN Drives. Scale 1/60.

gundam_item.title: RG 1/144 God Gundam
gundam_item.description: Real Grade model kit of the God Gundam from Mobile Fighter G Gundam. Features advanced articulation for martial arts poses. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: HGUC 1/144 The O
gundam_item.description: High Grade Universal Century model kit of Paptimus Scirocco's The O from Zeta Gundam. A bulky kit with hidden arms. Scale 1/144.

gundam_item.title: MG 1/100 Turn A Gundam
gundam_item.description: Master Grade model kit of the titular mobile suit from Turn A Gundam, designed by Syd Mead. Features unique aesthetics and cow figure. Scale 1/100.

gundam_item.title: RG 1/144 Zeong
gundam_item.description: Real Grade model kit of the Zeong mobile suit from Mobile Suit Gundam. Features detailed frame and detachable forearms. Scale 1/144.
